https://tmrev.io/movie/200759-Bakuryu Sentai Abaranger Deluxe: Abare Summer is Freezing Cold! 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/orIg4vJsd9525mTe84g4TNvFVqF.jpg The main theatrical release of Bakuryu Sentai Abaranger. This easily fits in between the events of episodes 21 and 22 of Abaranger as this is after Burstosaur Ankyloveilus's introduction, but before AbareKiller kidnaps Burstosaur Bachycelonagurus and Burstosaur Dimenokodon. Bakuryu Sentai Abaranger Deluxe: Abare Summer is Freezing Cold!
